question: Which of these statements about biological nitrogen fixing is TRUE?

choices.A: The reduction of N to NH occurs at the FeMo cofactor. 2 3
choices.B: The P-cluster dissociates after each electron is transferred to the FeMo cofactor.
choices.C: ATP hydrolysis stimulates the reduction of N to NH . 2 3
choices.D: The reduction of N to NH occurs when 6 electrons have collected at the FeMo 2 3 cofactor.
choices.E: Reduction of the dinitrogen reductase (Fe-protein) requires ATP hydrolysis.
